author: James Martin
method: In a large pan gently heat the ginger ale and orange juice.  Add all the other ingredients. Bring to the boil, remove from the heat and leave for a few minutes to allow the flavours to infuse. Serve.
ingredients: 1.5 litres/2½ pints ginger ale/ginger beer ,  750ml/1¼ pints orange juice ,  1 large lemon, juice and zest ,  2 oranges, juice and zest ,  4 cinnamon sticks ,  ¼ tsp grated nutmeg ,  12 cloves ,  5 star anise ,  2.5cm/1in fresh ginger, grated
